document.full_text: the distinction between playoff and regular season basketball is a popular n.b.a. meme, but the differences -- especially in regard to pace -- are less important than one might think.
document.title: the myth of "playoff-style basketball"
lines_and_colors: the distinction between playoff and regular season basketball is a popular n.b.a. meme, but the differences -- especially in regard to pace -- are less important than one might think.
